About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hello! My name is Carlos Lopez-Navas. I am a Toronto-based web developer if i'm not freelancing with Canada's finest digital agencies, I'm working remotely on projects for entrepreneurs all over the world! I have a diverse set of skills, ranging from graphic design, to HTML + CSS(SASS) + Javascript, all the way to PHP, netlify and github. I provide custom frameworks and interactive websites for aesthetically pleasing yet functional sites for any needs of my clients!

Strive for Excellence.

CSS Design Award

Awarded for work that pushes the boundaries of UI, UX, and innovative development around the world.

D&AD Award

Recognized for the best in design and advertising.

Apple Designs Award

recognized for cutting edge apps on the Apple platform that reflect the best in app design, innovation, ingenuity, and technical achievement.
